channel.title: Ggplot2 on Angeline Protacio
channel.description: Recent content in Ggplot2 on Angeline Protacio

item.title: Drafting Batters in Fantasy Baseball, Part 1
item.description: My first season in Fantasy Baseball What is Fantasy Baseball? The Draft How I Prepared for the Draft My Draft Strategy Up Next My first season in Fantasy Baseball I joined an ESPN Fantasy Baseball League for the first time this year, which may come as a shock to those of you who know that I love both baseball and data. I was in an ESPN Fantasy Basketball League a few years ago, but because I haven’t watched basketball seriously in about 15 years, these were two very unsatisfying seasons.

item.title: Drafting Batters in Fantasy Baseball, Part 2
item.description:
So where are we now? Other Considerations: Positions for Feast or Famine But were they, though? Up Next
So where are we now? If you’re reading about my fantasy baseball experience for the first time, welcome! You may be better oriented by reading this first. In the previous post, I wrote about my draft strategy using WAR, and how I selected Posey, a catcher, in the second round, and Simmons, a shortstop, in the fourth round.
